fullplot: In Paris, after winning the lottery, the clerk Franèois goes to a bar in Pigalle and offers one hundred thousand Euros per month to the prostitute Daniela to live with him until the end of his money. Franèois is a lonely man, with heart problems and Daniela stays with him for eight days. Then, she decides to come back to her man, the mobster Charly, but she misses Franèois and returns to his place. But once a whore, always a whore.

title: How Much Do You Love Me?
